definitions.definition: A person who studies grammar , either scientifically or ( traditionally ) unscientifically .
examples: Huddleston and Pullum are well-known grammarians of the 21st century.

definitions.definition: A person who pedantically critiques the grammar of others' speech or writing, especially when unscientifically and misguidedly .
examples: They spent hours disabusing the misinformed rants of various armchair grammarians .

main_definition: A person who studies grammar , either scientifically or ( traditionally ) unscientifically .
secondary_definitions: ( loosely ) A person who pedantically critiques the grammar of others' speech or writing, especially when unscientifically and misguidedly .
